sn12.67:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn12.67:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
sn12.67:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn12.67:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.67:4.6: “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, sayaṃkataṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, paraṃkataṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, sayaṃkatañca paraṃkatañca jarāmaraṇaṃ, udāhu asayaṃkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ jarāmaraṇan”ti?
sn12.67:4.7: “Na kho, āvuso koṭṭhika, sayaṃkataṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, na paraṃkataṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, na sayaṃkatañca paraṃkatañca jarāmaraṇaṃ, nāpi asayaṃkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ.
sn12.67:5.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, sayaṅkatā jāti, paraṅkatā jāti, sayaṅkatā ca paraṅkatā ca jāti, udāhu asayaṅkārā aparaṅkārā adhiccasamuppannā jātī”ti?
sn12.67:5.2: “Na kho, āvuso koṭṭhika, sayaṅkatā jāti, na paraṅkatā jāti, na sayaṅkatā ca paraṅkatā ca jāti, nāpi asayaṅkārā aparaṅkārā adhiccasamuppannā jāti.
sn12.67:6.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, sayaṅkato bhavo … pe …
sn12.67:6.7: sayaṅkataṃ nāmarūpaṃ, paraṅkataṃ nāmarūpaṃ, sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca nāmarūpaṃ, udāhu asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ nāmarūpan”ti?
sn12.67:6.8: “Na kho, āvuso koṭṭhika, sayaṅkataṃ nāmarūpaṃ, na paraṅkataṃ nāmarūpaṃ, na sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca nāmarūpaṃ, nāpi asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ, adhiccasamuppannaṃ nāmarūpaṃ.
sn12.67:7.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, sayaṅkataṃ viññāṇaṃ, paraṅkataṃ viññāṇaṃ, sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca viññāṇaṃ, udāhu asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ viññāṇan”ti?
sn12.67:7.2: “Na kho, āvuso koṭṭhika, sayaṅkataṃ viññāṇaṃ, na paraṅkataṃ viññāṇaṃ, na sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca viññāṇaṃ, nāpi asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ.
sn12.67:8.1: “Idāneva kho mayaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ evaṃ ājānāma:
sn12.67:8.2: ‘na khvāvuso koṭṭhika, sayaṅkataṃ nāmarūpaṃ, na paraṅkataṃ nāmarūpaṃ, na sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca nāmarūpaṃ, nāpi asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ nāmarūpaṃ.
sn12.67:9.1: Idāneva ca pana mayaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ evaṃ ājānāma:
sn12.67:9.2: ‘na khvāvuso koṭṭhika, sayaṅkataṃ viññāṇaṃ, na paraṅkataṃ viññāṇaṃ, na sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca viññāṇaṃ, nāpi asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ.
sn12.67:10.1: Yathā kathaṃ panāvuso sāriputta, imassa bhāsitassa attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
sn12.67:10.3: Upamāyapidhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānanti.
sn12.67:10.4: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, dve naḷakalāpiyo aññamaññaṃ nissāya tiṭṭheyyuṃ.
sn12.67:10.10: Tāsañce, āvuso, naḷakalāpīnaṃ ekaṃ ākaḍḍheyya, ekā papateyya;
sn12.67:11.4: Idañca pana mayaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ imehi chattiṃsāya vatthūhi anumodāma:
sn12.67:12.1: ‘Jarāmaraṇassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṃ deseti, dhammakathiko bhikkhūti alaṃvacanāya.
sn12.67:12.2: Jarāmaraṇassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti, dhammānudhammappaṭipanno bhikkhūti alaṃvacanāya.
sn12.67:12.3: Jarāmaraṇassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhu nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto hoti, diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto bhikkhūti alaṃvacanāya.
sn12.67:12.14: avijjāya ce, āvuso, bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṃ deseti, dhammakathiko bhikkhūti alaṃvacanāya.
sn12.67:12.15: Avijjāya ce, āvuso, bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti, dhammānudhammappaṭipanno bhikkhūti alaṃvacanāya.
sn12.67:12.16: Avijjāya ce, āvuso, bhikkhu nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto hoti, diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto bhikkhūti alaṃvacanāyā’”ti.
